mapper.select:
select id, login_username, nickname, password, security_password, portrait, create_time, last_login_time, type, status, bound_cellphone, bound_email, modify_pwd_or from os_admin_user
login_username like '%${params.loginUsername}%'
and nickname like '%${params.nickname}%'
and bound_cellphone like '%${params.boundCellphone}%'
and bound_email like '%${params.boundEmail}%'
and status = #{params.status}
select * from os_admin_user where login_username = #{loginUsername} and password = #{password}
